name: Lifeline (Eschen)
description:
Essential Hints

Keep your momentum by facing in the direction you're moving, in order to avoid having to boost.

Refill your oxygen at the surface.

Buy upgrades at the base.

Controls

Turn: Mouse

Boost (uses oxygen): Space

Pick up gems/Open shop at base/Respawn: E

Place Pipe (when unlocked): F

Pick up Pipe: R

Description

Explore the depths to collect gems and get rich! Be careful that you don't run out of oxygen however, especially because that's your only method of propulsion! Your connection to the surface is the only thing keeping you alive down there.

Tip: If you face in the direction you're moving, you can glide without boosting much.

Credits

Solo project. Drawing isn't my specialty, as you can probably see.

Assets used:

Gem Icons https://opengameart.org/content/cc0-gem-icons
